name: Mr. Weenie's Odyssey
description:
Made with love.

Mr. Weenie's family is dead and turned into pizza. As the last survivor you must find their remains before putrefaction claims you too. Your world turns inside out, you must prevail or risk getting out of control.

The game is based on physics. Most objects will obstruct your path to collect the remains of your family (pizza slices). Furthermore, the room will be continually changing, affecting all objects and creating chaos; hindering your task of saving what's left of your family.

The most mortal enemy is the knife, it can slice you up and murder you instantly, be careful not to touch them. As you walk through the room, you start to rot... try to collect your family as quick as possible!
